@projectstartrek @MTA In 2001 in Calgary on a pedestrian street - Stephen Ave - 3 bike cops were zooming around lunchtime peeps.  Signs said no bikes/skateboards.  I yelled "slow down!"  They circled me.  Cop behind me kept saying "reciprocity" like it was a Buddhist mantra.  I asked him to spell it.
